description: React component 'Board' that renders a set of DayColumn components to display an itinerary. It includes props for days, and functions for adding activities and selecting activities, along with a static '+ Add Day' button.

methods.name: Board({ days = [], onAddActivity, onSelectActivity })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a list of DayColumn components based on 'days' prop and a button to add a day.
